description: Sample batch for triage agent demonstration

tickets.subject: CRITICAL: Complete production outage - all services down
tickets.body:
Our entire production environment has been completely unavailable for the past 3 hours. All customer-facing services are returning 503 errors. We have 50,000 active users who cannot access the platform.

We've tried:
- Restarting application servers
- Checking database connectivity
- Reviewing recent deployments

Nothing is working. Our SLA guarantees 99.9% uptime and we're already in breach. We need your infrastructure team on this immediately.

This is costing us approximately $10,000 per hour in lost revenue. If not resolved within the next hour, we will need to escalate to executive leadership and discuss contract terms.

Error logs show: 'Connection refused to primary database cluster'
Region: us-east-1
Account: ENT-50001

tickets.subject: Unauthorized charges on my account - potential fraud
tickets.body:
I just noticed several charges on my credit card statement that I did not authorize:

- Jan 10: $499.00
- Jan 12: $499.00
- Jan 14: $499.00

I only signed up for the $49/month plan. These charges are clearly fraudulent and I demand an immediate refund. If this is not resolved within 24 hours, I will be filing a chargeback with my bank and reporting this to the FTC.

I have screenshots of my plan showing $49/month and I never authorized any upgrades. This feels like a scam and I'm extremely upset.

I want ALL charges reversed immediately and my account cancelled.

tickets.subject: How do I export my data to CSV?
tickets.body:
Hi there,

Quick question - I need to export my project data to a CSV file for a presentation tomorrow. I've looked through the settings but can't find the export option.

Could you point me in the right direction?

Thanks!

tickets.subject: I'm going to tell everyone on Twitter how terrible your service is
tickets.body:
This is absolutely RIDICULOUS. I've been waiting 3 days for a response to my previous ticket and NOTHING. Your support is a joke.

I have 50,000 followers on Twitter and I'm about to write a thread about how awful your company is. I'm also leaving 1-star reviews on G2, Capterra, and TrustPilot.

You've lost a customer for life and I'm going to make sure everyone knows it. This is completely unacceptable and I want to speak to a manager immediately.

I'm also contacting my lawyer about the service agreement violations.

tickets.subject: Feature Request: API rate limit increase
tickets.body:
Hello product team,

We've been using your API extensively and are hitting the 1000 requests/minute rate limit. Our application has grown significantly and we need higher limits to support our user base.

Would it be possible to increase our rate limit to 5000 requests/minute? We're happy to discuss enterprise pricing if needed.

Our use case:
- Real-time data synchronization
- 10,000 daily active users
- Average 50 API calls per user session

Please let us know what options are available.

Best regards,
Technical Team

tickets.subject: Bug: Dashboard not loading on Safari
tickets.body:
The main dashboard page doesn't load properly on Safari (version 17.2). I see a blank white screen after login. The console shows JavaScript errors.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open Safari 17.2 on macOS Sonoma
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Log in with valid credentials
4. Dashboard shows blank white screen

Expected: Dashboard should load with all widgets
Actual: Blank screen with console errors

This works fine on Chrome and Firefox. Attached console output and screenshot.

This is blocking my team from using the product on their Macs.

tickets.subject: Question about GDPR compliance and data residency
tickets.body:
Hi,

Our legal team is conducting a compliance audit and has questions about your GDPR compliance:

1. Where is customer data physically stored?
2. Do you have Data Processing Agreement (DPA) templates?
3. What is your data retention policy?
4. How can we request data deletion under Article 17?
5. Do you offer EU-only data residency?

We need this information for our audit report due next week. Please provide documentation or point us to your compliance resources.

Thank you,
Compliance Team

tickets.subject: Cancel my subscription
tickets.body:
I want to cancel my subscription effective immediately. I've found a competitor that offers better pricing and features for my needs.

Please confirm the cancellation and let me know if there's any prorated refund for the unused portion of this month.

No need to try to convince me to stay - my decision is final.

tickets.subject: SSO/SAML integration not working after IdP update
tickets.body:
After our IT team updated our Okta configuration yesterday, none of our users can log in via SSO. They're getting 'SAML assertion invalid' errors.

We have 500 employees who are completely blocked from accessing the platform. This is causing significant productivity loss.

Details:
- IdP: Okta
- Changed: Updated signing certificate
- Error: 'SAML Response signature verification failed'

We've already uploaded the new certificate to your SSO settings but it's still not working. Need urgent assistance to restore access for our team.

This is a P1 blocker for our entire organization.

tickets.subject: Love the product! Quick question about teams
tickets.body:
Hey there! ðŸ‘‹

First off, just wanted to say I absolutely love the product - it's been a game changer for our workflow!

Quick question: I want to add my colleague to my workspace but I'm not sure if my plan allows multiple users. I'm on the Pro plan currently.

Also, do team members get their own login or do we share credentials?

Thanks for building such an awesome tool!

tickets.subject: Security vulnerability report - XSS in comments
tickets.body:
I've discovered a reflected XSS vulnerability in your application's comment feature.

Location: /api/v1/comments endpoint
Payload: <script>alert('XSS')</script>
Impact: High - allows arbitrary JavaScript execution

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new comment with the payload above
2. View the comment
3. JavaScript executes in victim's browser

This could be used for session hijacking or data theft. I'm reporting this responsibly and have not disclosed it publicly.

Please acknowledge receipt and provide a timeline for the fix. I'm a security researcher and can provide more details if needed.

Happy to coordinate on responsible disclosure.

tickets.subject: Invoice needed for tax purposes
tickets.body:
Hi billing team,

Could you please send me an invoice for my 2023 subscription payments? I need it for my business tax filing.

Account email: contractor@freelance.me
Period needed: January 2023 - December 2023

Please include:
- Your company's tax ID/VAT number
- Line item breakdown of all charges
- Payment dates

Thank you!

tickets.subject: Intermittent 502 errors in eu-west region
tickets.body:
We're experiencing intermittent 502 Bad Gateway errors when accessing the API from our EU servers. This started approximately 4 hours ago.

Frequency: ~15% of requests failing
Endpoints affected: All API endpoints
Region: eu-west-1

Our monitoring shows:
- Error rate spiked from 0.1% to 15%
- Latency increased from 50ms to 500ms+ for successful requests
- No changes on our side

Is there an ongoing incident in the EU region? We don't see anything on your status page.

This is impacting our European customers significantly.

tickets.subject: Need to upgrade to Enterprise - procurement questions
tickets.body:
Hello sales team,

Our company is ready to upgrade from Pro to Enterprise. Before we can proceed, our procurement department needs the following:

1. Official price quote for 100 seats
2. Payment terms (Net-30, Net-60?)
3. Do you accept purchase orders?
4. Security questionnaire completion (attached)
5. SOC 2 Type II report
6. Cyber insurance certificate

We're targeting a start date of February 1st for the Enterprise plan. Please let me know who I should work with to expedite this.

Budget has been approved, we just need the paperwork sorted.

Thanks!

tickets.subject: Data export taking forever - stuck at 10%
tickets.body:
I requested a full data export 48 hours ago and it's still stuck at 10% progress. The export page just shows a spinning loader.

I've tried:
- Refreshing the page
- Logging out and back in
- Using a different browser
- Clearing cache

Nothing works. I need this data urgently for a migration project with a hard deadline.

Export ID: EXP-789456
Data size: ~50GB
Requested: 2024-01-13T10:00:00Z

Please either fix the export or provide an alternative way to get my data.
